title: Insect wreaks havoc on Tunisia’s crucial prickly pear industry
description:
By Jihed Abidellaoui Insect wreaks havoc on Tunisia’s crucial prickly pear industry

KAIROUAN, Tunisia, - A tiny insect is ravaging Tunisia’s prickly pears, a critical source of revenue for the North African country's agriculture sector and economy.

"Our biggest fear, which has caused me insomnia, ...
